description: Complete system overview documenting the inmate enrichment system architecture, core components, and high-level data flow between the worker, API, and web interface
Detailed documentation of the core data models (Inmate, EnrichmentJob, RelatedParty) and their relationships, including schema definitions and data validation rules
Comprehensive documentation of the DOB enrichment pipeline implementation, including the multi-step verification process, provider fallback logic, and status handling
Detailed explanation of the related party scoring algorithms, including weighted factors, confidence calculations, and validation rules used to determine relationship strength
Documentation of the integration with external data providers (HCSO, PDL, Pipl, Whitepages), including scraping logic, API interactions, and data normalization
